ingredients.ingredient: 2 (1 pound) loaves Mexican-style processed cheese food, cubed
½ pound cooked and peeled shrimp

cookingTips: Use Mexican cheese food (like Velveeta) for smooth, creamy consistency
Keep dip warm in a slow cooker on low setting to prevent separation
Chop seafood into bite-sized pieces so flavors distribute evenly throughout the dip
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Explain why processed cheese food works better than natural cheese for party dips, and how to keep this dip at the perfect consistency.
